text: @SenTedCruz The news of Li-Meng Yan told to Luther in 1/19/2020 was: COVID-19 is a new coronavirus discovered from the Zhoushan bat by the CCP military in 2018. This is a biological weapon. The CCP army used biotechnology to modify this virus to make it suitable for human transmission.. https://t.co/fFIMkbLhnG
